title: Is it permissible to assist someone in sin? (Helped teacher buy mobile holder, now she shows hair)
transcript: he says he a person assisted their teacher online on buying a mobile holder so that she could deliver her classes easier before buying this holder because she was holding it in her hand only part of her hair maybe of her shoulders would appear but now because she has the security of the holder she shows her hair makeup takes care of herself now the guy is in limbo what should i do you can't do anything the harm has been already done ask allah for forgiveness and next time you try your level best to weigh the pros and cons before doing such an action
